Title: Hiatus (1)
Plot: While working on an assignment, Gibbs is seriously injured in an explosion, and taken to a hospital, where he recalls his painful past, which he has always hidden from others. The rest of the team must proceed with the investigation and put their feelings towards Gibbs's injury aside. Tony is left in charge, which may cause a bit of trouble.
GuestStars: Mary Matilyn Mouser, Marcus Reynaga, Ariel Felix, Randy Flagler, Adam Lieberman, Aloma Wright, Tess Lina, Jarvis George, Burt Bulos, Christopher Maher, Darby Stanchfield, Cotter Smith, Brett Cullen
